backend/main.mo: Main canister actor with user profiles, posts, comments, chat, test history, daily tasks, and access-control-protected CRUD operations using storage and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module upgrading old userProfiles to a new schema by adding email and photoUrl fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the functionality of various frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions with light/dark theme CSS variables and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with pre-hydration theme bootstrap and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with a QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Root layout applying theme, welcome overlay, hiding UI on certain routes, and bootstrapping user profile before rendering child routes.
frontend/src/components/community/ChatPa: A group chat interface that lists messages, allows authenticated users to send messages, and lets admins delete them.
frontend/src/components/community/Commen: Displays comments for a post, allows authenticated users to add comments, and lets admins delete them.
frontend/src/components/community/ErrorB: An alert banner that displays an error message with an optional dismiss button.
frontend/src/components/community/PostCa: Shows a community post with image, caption, likes, comments, and admin controls for deleting or blocking users.
frontend/src/components/community/PostCo: A form for creating new posts with image upload, caption input, validation, and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/dailyTarget/Dail: A task item with checkbox, edit and delete actions, supporting inline editing and status updates.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Provides UI to upload, validate, save, or reset a dashboard background image with auth checks and error handling.
frontend/src/components/FocusBabuLogo.ts: Clickable logo component that navigates to the home route and supports different size variants.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and clearing query cache on sign-out.
frontend/src/components/ncert/ChapterLis: Renders a list of NCERT chapters with PDF view and download actions, including URL validation and error alerts.
frontend/src/components/ncert/ClassSecti: Displays an expandable class section that reveals subject cards for physics, chemistry, biology, and mathematics.
frontend/src/components/ncert/SubjectCar: Shows an expandable subject card that lists chapters or parts using ChapterList components.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Co: Provides preset and custom color selection for the timer and syncs changes with parent state.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Du: Lets users adjust focus and break durations with buttons and numeric inputs, enforcing valid ranges.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Me: Displays daily session count and streak, refreshing metrics periodically.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Mu: Toggles background lo‑fi music using localStorage and an audio hook.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Po: Main Pomodoro timer UI coordinating timer logic, audio cues, quotes, metrics, and control panels.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/Pr: Renders an SVG circular progress ring with glow and animated stroke offset.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/So: Toggles ticking sound and shows bell notification info.
frontend/src/components/PomodoroTimer/us: Custom hook managing durations, countdown logic, session switching, colors, and ticking state with persistence.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Navigation bar that hides in streamer mode on the timer page and provides route buttons and login.
frontend/src/components/SocialLinks.tsx: Displays Instagram and X links with size variants for header or footer.
frontend/src/components/testSeries/ExamS: Implements a timed exam interface with questions, navigation, answer tracking, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/testSeries/previ: Manages navigation, timing, answer selection, and submission flow for previous-year exam papers.
Calculates and displays results for previous-year exams with score, accuracy, and save-status alerts.
frontend/src/components/testSeries/Previ: Lists previous year exam papers by exam type and provides start buttons for each paper via PaperCard components.
frontend/src/components/testSeries/TestH: Displays a user's test history, handling authentication, loading states, errors, and empty history with profile info.
frontend/src/components/testSeries/TestR: Shows detailed results for a completed test, including score metrics, save-status messages, and user answer evaluation.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggleButto: A button that toggles between dark and light themes using useTheme and displays Sun or Moon icons.
frontend/src/components/user/AuthProfile: Prefetches and updates the user profile after authentication without rendering UI.
Renders a user avatar with optional photo and fallback initials, supporting multiple sizes.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeMotivatio: A temporary full‑screen overlay that shows a random motivational message and fades out automatically.
frontend/src/hooks/community/useChat.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and sending chat messages with automatic polling and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/community/useComments: Implements comment retrieval and creation with React Query and backend actor integration.
frontend/src/hooks/community/useModerati: Contains admin-related hooks for deleting posts, comments, chat messages, and blocking users.
frontend/src/hooks/community/usePosts.ts: Handles fetching, creating, and liking posts with backend actor calls and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/community/useUserProf: Provides hooks to fetch a user profile by principal and derive a display name using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/dailyTarget/useDailyT: Implements CRUD hooks for per-user daily tasks stored in localStorage and synced via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/testSeries/useCountdo: A countdown timer hook with start, stop, reset, and internal interval handling.
frontend/src/hooks/testSeries/useTestHis: Hooks to fetch and save test results through the backend using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudio.ts: Controls audio playback via a reusable hook with play, pause, and loop support.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthState.ts: Returns current authentication state, derived principal strings, and login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardBackgroun: Fetches, uploads, and clears dashboard background blobs via backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, identity persistence, and status management.
Syncs a React state value with localStorage for persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains hooks for fetching and saving caller and arbitrary user profiles using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS defining fonts, Tailwind layers, theming variables, and animated background styles.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Defines branding constants and helpers for site name, tagline, and app identifier.
frontend/src/lib/color.ts: Provides utilities to convert hex colors to RGBA and generate glow or text-shadow effects, plus hex color validation.
frontend/src/lib/ncertData.ts: Defines NCERT class, subject, and chapter metadata and embeds Class 11 textbook chapter lists with official PDF links.
frontend/src/lib/ncertLinks.ts: Validates NCERT PDF URLs, safely encodes/decodes them, and provides an error message for invalid links.
frontend/src/lib/previousYearPapers/cata: Contains a static catalog of previous year exam papers for JEE Main, NEET, and CUET.
frontend/src/lib/previousYearPapers/inde: Exports catalog, types, and a registry mapping paper IDs to metadata, with helpers to fetch papers and filter by exam.
frontend/src/lib/previousYearPapers/pape: Defines sample CUET 2023 and 2024 papers with generated sections and placeholder multiple‑choice questions.
Defines the JEE Main 2021 paper with physics and chemistry sections and manually written MCQs.
Defines the JEE Main 2022 paper with physics and chemistry sections and fixed MCQs.
Defines the JEE Main 2023 all‑shifts paper with physics and chemistry MCQs, some including solutions.
Defines detailed JEE Main 2024 all‑shifts paper metadata with physics questions and solutions.
Provides NEET 2021 paper metadata with autogenerated questions across four sections.
Defines NEET 2022 paper using template-generated questions for all subjects.
Supplies NEET 2023 exam metadata with auto‑generated section questions.
Contains NEET 2024 paper with explicit physics and chemistry questions and answers.
frontend/src/lib/previousYearPapers/type: Declares TypeScript interfaces for structuring previous‑year exam papers, sections, and questions.
frontend/src/lib/quotes.ts: Stores a list of motivational quotes and exposes a random‑quote selector.
frontend/src/lib/studyMetrics.ts: Manages study session metrics in localStorage, tracking streaks and daily sessions.
frontend/src/lib/testSeriesData.ts: Defines test series question types, sample sets, validation helpers, and config generators.
frontend/src/lib/userIdentity.ts: Provides helpers for resolving display names and deriving user initials.
frontend/src/lib/welcomeMotivationMessag: Contains predefined welcome messages and a function to pick one randomly.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point rendering the React app with query client and identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Renders the community page with posts, chat panel, and login prompts, fetching and displaying posts when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/DailyTargetPage.tsx: Displays daily tasks with add, edit, toggle, delete, and reset functionality, handling auth-gated interactions and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Shows the landing page with timer, social links, and optional custom background based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/NcertPage.tsx: Lists NCERT book sections for classes 11 and 12 with a header and footer.
frontend/src/pages/NcertPdfViewerPage.ts: Validates NCERT PDF URLs and redirects to the main PDF viewer or NCERT page, showing a loading state.
frontend/src/pages/PdfViewerPage.tsx: Implements a PDF viewer with navigation, zoom controls, download, and validation handling for NCERT PDFs.
frontend/src/pages/TestSeriesPage.tsx: Manages test series views including starting tests, submitting answers, calculating results, and saving history.
frontend/src/pages/TimerPage.tsx: Provides a standalone Pomodoro timer with persistent streamer and transparency settings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining dark mode, content paths, custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app features, architecture notes, issues, and versioned feature list for the Focus Babu study website.
